tooltip.create_auto_track.2: Place roadbed blocks (e.g., wood, dirt, or stone) on top of the machine.
tooltip.create_auto_track.3: Place train tracks on top of the roadbed blocks.
tooltip.create_auto_track.5: Finally, use a sturdy plate while sneaking to lay the track.
tooltip.create_auto_track.7: Shift + Right-click (empty hand) to switch the laying direction.
tooltip.create_auto_track.8: When setting coordinates: round up for positive values, round down for negative values, otherwise track laying might fail!
message.create_auto_track.roadbed: You need to place a roadbed block above the machine!
message.create_auto_track.track: You need to place train tracks above the roadbed block!
